title: Design Tokens & Accessibility Implementation
details:
## Design Tokens & Accessibility Implementation Guide

### Design Token Architecture:

1. **Global Tokens** (Colors, fonts, spacing)
   - Colors: `--color-[name]-[weight]` (e.g., `--color-blue-100`)
   - Fonts: `--font-heading`, `--font-body`
   - Sizes: T-shirt sizing (`--font-size-sm`, `--font-size-md`, `--font-size-lg`)
   - Spacing: `--spacing-sm`, `--spacing-md`, `--spacing-lg`

2. **Semantic Tokens** (Named for function)
   - `--link-default`, `--link-hover`, `--link-focus`
   - Purpose-driven naming for states and contexts

3. **Component Tokens** (Component-specific)
   - `--accordion-padding-block`
   - `--modal-backdrop-color`
   - Prefixed with component name

### CSS Custom Properties Best Practices:

1. **:root Selector for Global Tokens**
   ```css
   :root {
     --color-blue-100: #f4f8fb;
     --color-blue-200: #54a9fa;
     --color-blue-300: #4178ff;
     --font-heading: 'Inter';
     --font-body: system-ui;
   }
   ```

2. **Accessibility-First Color Contrast**
   - WCAG 2.2 AA minimum: 4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text
   - Target AAA levels: 7:1 and 4.5:1 respectively for better accessibility
   - Avoid pure black on white (21:1) - can cause migraines
   - "Goldilocks Zone" between 4.5:1 and 7:1 for optimal readability

3. **Design Token Integration with Tailwind**
   - Create tokens.json with centralized values
   - Configure tailwind.config.js to extend theme with tokens
   - Maintain consistency across utility classes

### Motion & Animation Accessibility:

1. **prefers-reduced-motion Support**
   ```css
   @media (prefers-reduced-motion: reduce) {
     .animated-element {
       animation: none !important;
       transition: none !important;
     }
   }
   ```

2. **Platform Support**
   - macOS: System Preferences > Accessibility > Display > Reduce motion
   - Windows 11: Settings > Accessibility > Visual Effects > Animation Effects
   - iOS: Settings > Accessibility > Motion
   - Android 9+: Settings > Accessibility > Remove animations

### Key Implementation Considerations:
- Keep global tokens minimal to avoid unwieldy systems
- Document naming conventions for team consistency
- Bridge design and development with common token language
- Ensure runtime CSS variable overrides for theming
- Test with actual users across diverse abilities and devices
